languages.text: Губернатор Медина поведал, что дознаватель отправился в Благословенную Электродинамическую обитель. Искать агента Золотого Трона следует именно там.
Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.
languages.original_text: Губернатор Медина поведал, что дознаватель отправился в Благословенную Электродинамическую обитель. Искать агента Золотого Трона следует именно там.

traits.locale_text: Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.
Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.
Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.
Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.

languages.text: Gouverneur Medineh hat {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} berichtet, dass der Interrogator zum Heiligen Elektrodynamischen Cenobium unterwegs war. Dort ist der wahrscheinlichste Aufenthaltsort dieses Agenten des Goldenen Throns.
languages.original_text: Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.

traits.locale_text: Gouverneur Medineh hat {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} berichtet, dass der Interrogator zum Heiligen Elektrodynamischen Cenobium unterwegs war. Dort ist der wahrscheinlichste Aufenthaltsort dieses Agenten des Goldenen Throns.

languages.text: Le gouverneur Medineh a dit {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} que l'interrogateur était parti pour le saint Cenobium électrodynamique. C'est là-bas que se trouve certainement cet agent du Trône d'Or.
languages.original_text: Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.

traits.locale_text: Le gouverneur Medineh a dit {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} que l'interrogateur était parti pour le saint Cenobium électrodynamique. C'est là-bas que se trouve certainement cet agent du Trône d'Or.

languages.text: 梅迪涅总督告诉行商浪人，说那位审讯官去了神圣电驱修会。黄金王座的代理人说不定此刻就在那间修道院附近。
languages.original_text: Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.

traits.locale_text: 梅迪涅总督告诉行商浪人，说那位审讯官去了神圣电驱力修会。黄金王座的代理人说不定此刻就在那间修道院附近。

languages.text: メディネ総督はインテロゲイターが神聖なる電力連生体に向かったと自由開拓者に告げた。黄金の玉座の諜報員はそこにいる可能性が高い。
languages.original_text: Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.

traits.locale_text: メディネ総督はインテロゲイターが神聖なる電力連生体に向かったと自由開拓者に告げた。黄金の玉座の諜報員はそこにいる可能性が高い。

languages.text: El gobernador Medineh ha informado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de que el Interrogador se dirigió al sagrado Cenobio Electrodinámico. Es probable que el agente del Trono Dorado siga ahí.
languages.original_text: Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.

traits.locale_text: El gobernador Medineh ha informado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de que el Interrogador se dirigió al sagrado Cenobio Electrodinámico. Es probable que el agente del Trono Dorado siga ahí.

languages.text: Vali Medineh, Hür Tacir'e Sorgucu'nun Mukaddes Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu'na gittiğini bildirdi. Bu Altın Taht vekilinin orada olma ihtimali yüksek.
languages.original_text: Governor Medineh told the Rogue Trader that the Interrogator headed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It is there that this agent of the Golden Throne is most likely to be found.

traits.locale_text: Vali Medineh, Hür Tacir'e Sorgucu'nun Mukaddes Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu'na gittiğini bildirdi. Bu Altın Taht vekilinin orada olma ihtimali yüksek.
